amendment.description: Amendment sought to require recipients of rental assistance under the bill to perform 20 hours per week of approved work activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 110-53 to require recipients of rental assistance under the bill to perform 20 hours per week of approved `work activities.' Approved activities include work, preparation to find work, vocational education, community service, and providing child care services. Exemptions are provided for senior citizens, the disabled, those already exempt from TANF work requirements, and those who cannot access child care.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 266 (Roll no. 164).
